title: Coronavirus updates: COVID-19 has killed more than 6,000 in the U.S.
description: White House expected to issue new guidelines on face coverings as Fauci says he can't understand why there's no nationwide stay-at-home order.
content:
The COVID-19 pandemic could be brought under control by the end of April, the China's leading respiratory expert has said, warning that it could resurge next spring.
